stdout_excerpt:
MCP Agent Mail server (HTTP/MCP runtime + TUI)

Usage: mcp-agent-mail [OPTIONS] [COMMAND]

Commands:
  serve   Start the MCP server (default)
  config  Show configuration
  help    Print this message or the help of the given subcommand(s)

Options:
  -v, --verbose  Enable verbose logging
  -h, --help     Print help
  -V, --version  Print version

Operator CLI commands live in `am`:
  am --help

Or enable the CLI surface on this same binary:
  AM_INTERFACE_MODE=cli mcp-agent-mail --help
